mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore, Shelley, and Lynn Moore next to a "Vote Tuesday" sign
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr., his wife, Shelley, and Lynn Moore looking over the sample ballot in his Clarksburg District Office. A sign on the table reads, "Vote Tuesday."
